mergeResults.content: Queen's Own Herald. Complete mind-merge with Rance—he now possesses all her memories, training, state secrets; she received his trauma memories. Currently with Healer Crescent, overwhelmed but unharmed. Rance helped her process deeply buried trauma during merge—arranged marriage escape, Empathy awakening struggles, fear of losing identity, constant responsibility pressure. STANCE-Rance: profoundly intimate knowledge shared; boundaries violated but ultimately therapeutic; complicated mix of gratitude and vulnerability.
